title: Merrimack Valley Girls' High School Fall Basketball
text:
Merrimack Valley Girls' High School Fall Basketball 
Chelmsford 43, Whittier 20 
Chelmsford got its first win of this Fall Ball season thanks to Annie Donahue’s 18 points. Raianna Edwards-Thomas added 13 for the Lions, and Whittier was led by Maria Arias and Kayle Hobbs, who each scored 7 points. 
Billerica 44, North Andover 32 
Billerica knocked off North Andover to remain undefeated on the season. MacKenzie Watford led the Indians with 13 points, and the Knights got 14 points from Emily Sifferlen and Grace Liporto added 11. 
Central Catholic 68, Lawrence 19 
Central Catholic beat Lawrence to win its fourth game in a row. The Raiders were led by Maura Smith’s 12 points while Nicole Elbeery added 11 points. The Lancers got 7 points from Jayla Reyna. 
Andover 56, Methuen 18 
Andover easily handled Methuen to continue its strong start. Alyssa Casey had 18 points, Jillian Webber added 16 and Meghan Stickney scored 14 points. The Rangers were lead by Akemma Chibuogwu’s 7 points. 

Games on Sunday at Lowell Catholic 
Chelmsford vs Andover, 3 p.m. 
Whittier vs Methuen, 4 p.m. 
Lawrence vs North Andover, 5 p.m. 
Billerica vs Central Catholic, 6 p.m. Sign Up / Sign In With your existing account from... {* loginWidget *}
